name: Grandma Taylor
descriptions: Agnes Taylor (simply called Grandma Taylor) was a resident of Vault 101 in 2277.

Agnes was part of a survey team who went to Megaton in 2241. She remained outside the vault to serve as a scout from Vault 101, acting as an ambassador of sorts to Megaton, and was continually collecting information about the wasteland. Her final resting place is the diner encountered during Escape!

When the Lone Wanderer is trying to escape the vault, the player character can see Grandma Taylor dead on the floor of the Vault 101 cafeteria surrounded by radroaches. During Trouble on the Homefront, Officer Taylor tells the Lone Wanderer that he "lost  poor wife Agnes" because "her old ticker just couldn't take it anymore."
